example:
() => (
  <Stack>
    <Stack>
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Bottom
      </Heading>
      <Popover
        preferredPosition="bottom"
        content={
          <Stack spacing="small">
            <ButtonLink
              external
              type="secondary"
              fullWidth
              href="https://orbit.kiwi/components/popover/react/"
            >
              Reference
            </ButtonLink>
            <ButtonLink
              external
              type="secondary"
              fullWidth
              href="https://orbit.kiwi/components/popover/"
            >
              Guidelines
            </ButtonLink>
          </Stack>
        }
      >
        <Button circled title="Help" iconLeft={<Icons.QuestionCircle />} />
      </Popover>
    </Stack>
    <Stack>
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Top
      </Heading>
      <Popover
        preferredPosition="top"
        content={
          <Stack spacing="small">
            <ButtonLink
              external
              type="secondary"
              fullWidth
              href="https://orbit.kiwi/components/popover/react/"
            >
              Reference
            </ButtonLink>
            <ButtonLink
              external
              type="secondary"
              fullWidth
              href="https://orbit.kiwi/components/popover/"
            >
              Guidelines
            </ButtonLink>
          </Stack>
        }
      >
        <Button circled title="Help" iconLeft={<Icons.QuestionCircle />} />
      </Popover>
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Position
info.description: If you set a preferred position relative to the child, the popover will be placed there if there's room. Otherwise, preference is given in the order of bottom then top.
